description: BAR M Controlled Vocabulary. All deterministic system components must use these definitions and enumerations. No subjective or capacious terminology allowed.

basisPoint.definition: One hundredth of one percent (0.01%). All variances and risk scores shall be expressed in basis points.

timestampUTC.definition: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp used for all BRRMS events.

varianceFlag.definition: Deterministic classification of deviation based on explicit basis point thresholds.

severityFlag.definition: Deterministic classification of insurance-layer risk severity.

auditState.definition: Deterministic audit state. No subjective qualifiers permitted.

settlementState.definition: Deterministic state for revenue settlement workflows.

insuranceAction.definition: Enumerated actions taken by the insurance layer.

notes: No new terms may be introduced without adding them to this file.
All schemas, smart contracts, and workflows must reference these definitions.
Ambiguous language (reasonable, appropriate, material, etc.) is prohibited unless explicitly defined here.
